thread.section_title: Ziffit Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.ziffit.com | 9 of 222
thread.title: matt w

author: matt w
title: matt w
text:
Offer much better rates for old DVDs than many competitors. Shipping and collection was excellent as was ability to track parcel
Only 4 stars as two DVDs I sent came back on the final check out as 'expired'. Meaning I didn't get paid for them and obviously they weren't returned. No idea why these two and they were fairly high priced. Maybe that was the reason?
Would use this company again though.
